loans.name: Mkamburi

texts.en:
Mkamburi is a married woman and owns a house that has piped water, but not electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is food.
 
Mkamburi has operated a tailoring business for the past four years. She makes women’s dresses and men’s suits. Her potential clients are ladies and gents.  

With the KES 30,000, she wants to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 24 years old. She is a single lady living with her family, consisting of six members, in a sector in Jordan called Ajloun. 

She is a university student majoring in tourist guiding, and she is one step closer to graduation. Now she is seeking a loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees so that she will support her family after graduation.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 21 year-old-single man from Khan Younis. He lives with his family in a small house in the city. His father works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low wage. Ali opened a small library recently in the city. It is a good business and located near some schools. Ali would like to improve his business.

Ali took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his library. By taking this loan, Ali will be able to provide more services such as printing reports and doing research. This will increase his productivity and also his income.

Ali appears in the photo in his library.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his library

loans.name: Amaal

texts.en:
Amaal is a 53-year-old married woman from Khan Younis. She is the mother of five sons and two daughters. Amaal has a grocery store in the city that has been open for the past ten years. It is a good business and the demand is high.

Amaal took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more items for her grocery store. By taking this loan, Amaal will be able to improve the store and increase the sales.

Amaal appears in the photo in her grocery store.

loans.use: to buy more items for her grocery store

loans.name: Irene Lisseth

texts.es: Irene tiene 19 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de 10 años de edad. Irene se dedica a la venta de ropa de forma ambulante desde hace 4 años aproximadamente. Ella y su compañero de vida hacen todo lo que pueden para sacar adelante a su familia. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea cambiar el material de la vivienda dado que la lámina se encuentra deteriorada y además desea construirle un corredor para evitar que el agua se filtre cuando llueve. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en:
Irene is 19 years and lives in her own home with her life companion and her young son of 10 years. Irene, as of aproximately four years ago, is dedicated to the sale of clothing in a mobile form. She and her life companion do everything they can in order to bring their family ahead. 

With the wish to improve the conditions of her life she has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI, given that she wants to change the material of the house. The metal is deteriorated and she also wishes to construct a hallway to avoid leaking water when it rains. With the amount requested she will buy galvanized metal, wood and nails.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal, wood and nails to repair the conditions of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase seeds and other materials for his both farming and agricultural business

loans.name: Divine Grace

texts.en: Divine Grace of Centro Napo, Tudela, Misamis Occidental is married and has three children. She has been operating a transportation service business for more than six years and is earning a better income for the family. She has successfully repaid her prior loan. Lately, she has been engaged in a flower vending business from which she earns a better income. Recently, she took a new loan from GDMPC micro finance to the purchase of a new set of tires to replace the old used tires and to pay maintenance costs. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a new set of tires and pay  maintenance costs

loans.name: Zahraa

texts.en: Zahraa is a 22-year-old Lebanese woman living with her parents, who has been working  in tailoring for three years at her house to help her family to meet the needs of life. She is well-known in her region by her good reputation. To better develop her work, Zahraa is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner, Vitas s.a.l. She will be utilizing the loan to buy new materials for her business such as textiles, scissors, and many other items. This will allow her to offer a greater variety of products and, thus, will improve her income.

loans.use: to buy new materials for her tailoring business

loans.name: Modesto

texts.en: Modesto has been working as a farmer for many years, earning well for the family. He has successfully repaid his previous loan used for the repair of his motorcycle. He also uses this motorcycle for transportation services and it adds a little income. His farm is doing well and he needs to improve the farm to make sure that he harvests more. He took a new loan recently to cover the cost of motorcycle maintenance and buy fertilizer. He hopes to earn more returns from his farm and provide a better living for the family in the future.

loans.use: to pay for motorcycle maintenance and buy fertilizer

loans.name: Rania

texts.en: Rania is 21 years old. She lives with her family consisting of six members. She is a university student majoring in English Language and Literature, and she is in her second year. Rania is seeking to work in her study field after graduation to help her family with their household fees, but she doesn't have enough money to pay for her upcoming semester fees. For that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en: Zeinab is 59 years old. She lives with her brother in a small village of Tskaltubo district. The family is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, they have a plot of agricultural land and a vineyard. Zeinab and her brother cultivate the land seasonally and grow maize. In addition, they have 30 nut trees. They sell the harvested products locally at a good price. Zeinab decided to start a husbandry business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables her to get a loan of 1000 Gel to purchase a cow. As the cow is purchased, she will start producing dairy products to sell as well as for family use. This will increase the income of her family and with increased income she will expand the business.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Loan

texts.en:
Loan, 42, lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City with her family, including two sons and her husband. Her husband grows bean sprouts for selling. Loan has earned money through her business of selling cosmetic products for seven years. 

Loan would like to get a loan to buy a larger stock of cosmetic products to meet her customers' needs. She also hopes her business will ensure that her family members, and especially her children, will have a better education and a better future.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products for selling.

loans.name: Muna

texts.en:
Muna was born in 1972. She is married and a mother of four sons and daughters. Her husband is a contractor. Muna has been supporting her husband in paying their household fees for two years by selling cosmetics to her friends and neighbours from her house. 

Muna is now seeking to expand her business by bringing in a larger quantity of cosmetics and perfumes. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more cosmetics and perfumes for her business

loans.name: Najah

texts.en:
Because Najah is a conservative person, she suggested that her husband appear in the picture instead of her. Najah is a 45-year-old housewife, married to Muhsin, who has retired from working at Jordan University. They have four children to raise. 

After her husband's retirement, Najah noticed that his pension wasn't enough to cover her children's needs. So she decided to help him by opening a store selling cosmetics and cleaning products in their neighborhood by taking several loans.

Najah is now applying for another loan to buy more products for their humble store to raise her profits.

loans.use: To buy more products for her humble store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase home appliances for the house.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Maranura, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convencion y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Felicitas se dedica al negocio de cultivo de frutas, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva platanos,cafe,mandarinas y naranjas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member is part of the communal bank "Virgen Del Carmen". The bank is located in the district of Maranura, which is in the province of La Convencion and the department of Cusco.

The member Felicitas makes a living at her business growing fruit. She has a plot of land where she cultivates bananas, coffee, mandarins, and oranges. She works from 6.00 am until 5.00 pm. She has had this business for some years already and it's going really well. Her dream is to increase her plot of land for cultivation. She is asking for the loan in order to buy seeds and fertilizers.

The member is happy about the loan and promises to honour her repayments.

loans.use: The member  is asking for a loan to buy seed and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase affordable and fashionable summer clothing to sell

loans.name: Natalia

texts.en: Natalia is 48 years old. She lives in Tianeti district with her pensioner father. Natalia works as a teacher at a local public school. This is the only income for the family. She decided to start a husbandry business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 3,000 Gel to purchase cows. After the cows are purchased, Natalia will start producing dairy products to sell locally. This will increase the income of the family. She plans to expand the business in the future and increase the number of cattle with the generated income. Natalia awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase cows

loans.name: Zainabu

texts.en:
Zainabu is a married woman with four children. She owns a house that has no electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees for her two school-going kids.

For the past two years, she has operated a boda boda (motorcycle) transport business, where her potential customers are town dwellers and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality, especially during rainy season when it becomes hard to operate. Her dream is to purchase another motorcycle in the near future.

With the KES 20,000 loan, she wants to service her motorcycle and purchase new spare parts.

loans.use: to service her motorcycle and purchase new spare parts

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en: Fatmeh is a 37-year-old Lebanese married mother of three children. In 2009, she started her own business by opening in her house a small room for vending clothes with her special selling methods and by selling high quality products. She is well known in her region for the special talents in her domain. Today, Fatmeh is demanding a loan from Kiva partner, Vitas s.a.l, to increase her business merchandise with new and special collections of clothes, to meet the needs of her clients in order to increase her income. Fatmeh is very proud of her business growth and she hopes to expand her earnings.

loans.use: to increase her business merchandise with new and special collections of clothes

loans.name: Anbebin Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Anbebin  est majoritairement composé de polygames. Elles ont en moyenne 38 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes à N’tomikorobougou l’un des quartiers de Bamako et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce de pâtes d’arachides, condiments, vêtement et restauration. Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 1èr cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Sitan (femme assise à l’extrême gauche sur la photo) a une grande renommée dans la vente des pâtes d’arachides de qualité dans tout le quartier. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 2 sacs de grains d’arachides en gros à Bamako. Pour faire la pâte d’arachide, on trie les meilleurs grains, les grille, les épluches et les Broie au moulin. La pâte ainsi faite est prête à la vente en détails à une clientèle composée majoritairement de femmes à N’tomikorobougou. Madame Sitan espère réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 40.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité.
texts.en:
The Anbebin group is mainly composed of women living in polygamous families. On the average, they are 38 years old, with four children. They all live in N’tomikorobougou, a neighborhood of Bamako, and know each other as neighbors. The group members work as vendors selling peanut paste, condiments, clothing and cooked dishes. With the goal of bolstering their working capital, the group members have decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso and are now on the first solidarity loan.

Mrs. Sitan (the one seated on the far left in the photo) is well known in the entire neighborhood as a vendor of high-quality peanut paste. She plans to use her loan to buy two bags of peanuts wholesale in Bamako. In order to make peanut paste, it is necessary to pick the best peanuts, grill and shell them and then grind them in a mill. The resulting peanut paste is ready to be retailed to a customer base composed mainly of local women. With this loan, Mrs. Sitan hopes to earn an average monthly revenue of 40,000 West African francs, which will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy peanuts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a small taxi sedan for her oldest son so that he can start up a taxi service business in town.

loans.name: Dung

texts.en:
Dung would like to take a further loan to buy a greater quantity of breads to sell from her stall. 

Dung's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and increase sales. 

She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of breads and a better quality of food to sell.

loans.name: Fawziah

texts.en:
Because Fawziah is a conservative person, she preferred that her husband Izzat appear in the photo. Fawziah is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of eight sons and daughter. She is married to Izzat who has a car repair workshop where he changes wheels and sells special car oil.

After he retired from the military, he opened his workshop to be able to support his big family. Fawziah wants to help her husband to make more income in the workshop, so she decided to apply for this loan and buy more high quality car oil, which is required for the new model cars, in addition to new tools that will make his work more professional.

loans.use: To buy more high quality car oil and more tools for her husband's auto repair shop

loans.name: Maria Nancy

texts.es:
En estos tiempos tan difíciles en los que hay que buscar alternativas para obtener un progreso efectivo y una vida digna, Maria intenta hacerse con un lugar en el mercado agropecuario.
Ella ha vivido gran parte de su vida en el campo y fue allí donde aprendió todas sus actividades ayudadas por su esposo y sus hijos. Son una familia muy unida y trabajan juntos buscando salir adelante.
Ella solicita el crédito para comprar una vaca lechera y cerdos de cría para aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar sus condicion de vida.
Decide iniciar con este negocio con el afán de buscar los recursos suficientes para la manutención de su hogar y ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
Su mayor problema es la falta de capital para invertir, pero confía en la solidaridad y buen corazón de las personas que la puedan ayudar.
texts.en:
During these difficult times when one must look for alternatives to make effective progress and have a decent life, Maria intends to make a place for herself in the agricultural market. She has lived most of her life in the country, which is where she learned all of the trades that have helped her husband and children. They are a very close-knit family and work together so that they can move forward.

Maria is requesting a loan so that she can buy a dairy cow and pigs to raise. This will help her to increase her income and improve her living conditions. She decided to start this business in hopes of generating sufficient income to maintain her household and provide a better quality of life for her children. Her greatest problem is the lack of investment capital. She is placing her trust in the support and good hearts of people who can help.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow and pigs to raise.

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
Juana de 40 años de edad, es madre de 5 hijos de 22, 19, 17, 13 y 7 años de edad los cuales 2 le ayudan a trabajar y 3 aún siguen estudiando. Juana no pudo estudiar debido a la pobreza en que vivía, Juana se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde, a la siembra de hortalizas y a la agricultura desde hace 17 años, y se decidió porque vio que la crianza de pollos le podía dar mas ingresos. Ella trabaja junto a su compañero de vida.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en CREDICAMPO, es para la compra de concentrado para la crianza de 400 pollos y así poder mejorar el negocio para obtener mejores ingresos y poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Juana tiene proyectado que al mejorar su negocio, podrá ahorrar para que sus hijos puedan sacar sus estudios, también sueña con mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Juana is 40 years old.  She is the mother of five children ages 22, 19, 17, 13 and 7.  Two of them help her work and the other three are still in school.  Juana was not able to attend school because of the poverty in which she lived.  Juana has worked raising chickens that she fattens up, growing vegetables, and farming for the past 17 years.  She decided to work in this field because she saw that raising chickens could generate more income.  She works with her spouse.

The loan that she is seeking from CREDICAMPO will be used to purchase animal feed to raise 400 chickens, which will allow her to improve her business and generate more income, as well as giving her family a better quality of life.  Juana believes that when she improves her business, she will be able to save for her children to attend school.  She also dreams about repairing her home.

loans.use: purchase animal feed to raise 400 chickens.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali was born in 1969. He is married and lives in an area in Jordan called Hashmiya. Ali has been running his supermarket for two years. His business is his only source of income which helps him to cover his family's needs. Ali is seeking to expand his supermarket by carrying more products in order to increase his profit. He has applied for this loan as he doesn't have enough money to make the necessary purchases.

loans.use: To purchase more products to expand his supermarket

loans.name: Kreyol Essence

texts.en: Kreyòl Essence is a social business creating critical new jobs in rural Haiti, a nation still recovering from the devastating 2010 earthquake and suffering from 40% unemployment. The company plans to expand the manufacturing and distribution of a variety of eco-luxury beauty products made from Haitian black castor oil, following a successful pilot program earlier this year. These products are farmed by Haitians, bottled by Haitians and exported by Haitians. Muhammad Yunus, a Nobel Peace Prize Laureate and the father of microcredit, has endorsed Kreyòl Essence for funding on Kiva. All profits Kreyòl Essence makes are reinvested in the business itself to increase its social impact where it matters most: with women and farmers in Haiti. This loan will enable Kreyòl Essence to create new jobs for Haitian farmers to grow castor plants, and new jobs for women to make castor oil from its seeds. Kreyòl Essence will focus especially on employing women, and make sure that all their employees receive fair wages and benefits. They expect to repay the loan in seven years. Funding on Kiva will allow Kreyòl Essence to access capital that is difficult to get through traditional banks in Haiti, because the loan size is too small to be profitable for a bank. You can learn more about small and medium enterprise loans on Kiva here. In addition to job creation, Kreyòl Essence also helps to address Haiti’s problem of deforestation and soil erosion. Haiti’s forested lands have been reduced to less than 2%. By cultivating castor oil plants, Kreyòl Essence helps to protect the surrounding area from erosion. The castor oil plant used in the company’s products is one of the few perennials able to grow and repair depleted soils with limited rainfall and minimal agricultural inputs. Kreyòl Essence aims to plant over 40,000 castor oil plants in the next 3 years, helping to stem the tide of soil erosion.

loans.use: create more than 300 jobs for women and farmers in rural Haiti.

loans.name: Marlon Bladimir

texts.es: Marlon tiene 37 años de edad y habita  en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hija de 12 años de edad. Marlon se dedica al comercio de pescado y pollo desde hace 10 años. La venta la realiza de forma ambulante por lo que  ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Marlon desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda y terminar de construir un muro en su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de arena, ladrillo, cemento, lámina y madera.
texts.en:
Marlon is 37 years old and resides in his own home with his life companion and their 12-year-old daughter. He has been working as a fish and chicken seller for the past 10 years. Marlon conducts his sales as a street vendor and has many customers who are referred to him each day.

He wants to improve the roof of his house and also finish the construction of a wall in his home. For this reason, he is requesting a loan FUSAI so that he can invest in the purchase of sand, bricks, cements, metal sheets, and wood.

loans.use: to buy construction materials so that he can repair the roof of his house and build a wall.

loans.name: Vusal

texts.en:
Vusal, 37 years old, has been married for 12 years and has three children, 10, 8 and 7 years old. Vusal’s wife doesn’t work because she takes care of the children so Vusal provides for all of the family's needs. Vusal is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) from his home, which was in Fuzuli, and now is living in the Baku region with his lovely family. 

Vusal has been in the manufacturing business for 10 years, making and selling doors and windows frames from wood. He needs a loan of 1,000 Azerbaijan New Manat (AZN) to buy necessary materials. He has applied to Komak for a loan and he hopes that this will help to develop his business.

loans.use: to buy necessary materials

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en: Fatmeh is a 31-year-old Lebanese woman who lives with her family. She works hard and tries her best to be as helpful as she can in her family. Two years ago, she started her own job by opening a beauty salon in her house. She has her loyal customers who are so grateful for her. Fatmeh is requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva partner, Vitas s.a.l., to purchase a dryer, scissors, chairs, etc. for her business so that she will be able to serve her customers with good quality products.

loans.use: to purchase a dryer, scissors, chairs, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build her own small cafe and cook traditional food for local residents

loans.name: Hazar

texts.en: Hazar is a 32-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and one child. She cooperates with her husband to fulfill her family's needs. In 2010, she decided to open her own beauty salon in her house in order to share some of the responsibilities with her husband. Today, she’s looking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase new merchandise for her beauty Salon. In that way, she will be able to serve her customers with good quality products. In the future, she plans to open her own beauty center.

loans.use: to purchase new merchandise for her beauty salon

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en: Hasan is a 19-year-old single Lebanese man. Since 2011, he has operated a shop for shoes. To help him continue operating his business, he is requesting today to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. He will use the loan to buy a new product for his shop which he needs to continue production. He expects an increase in his income as he is expanding his work and hopes that his business will grow. He dreams of being able to reach his goals.

loans.use: to buy a new product for his shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair her store and help her husband build a tire service place

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase a flat sewing machine to produce items that can only be made on this type of machine.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is a married woman who has four children. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for the family and fees for her school-going children.

For the past two years, Hassan has operated a cereals shop business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Hassan dreams of establishing a wholesale cereals shop business in the future. 

Hassan wants to use this KES 50,000 loan to purchase stock of wheat, maize, beans and rice for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of wheat, maize, beans and rice for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her clothing business.

loans.name: Ana Mirian

texts.es:
Ana de 43 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 4 hijos de 24, 22, 19 y 17 años de edad los cuales 2 están viviendo con Ana y los otros 2 ya están casados, su esposo se dedica a la albañilería en el verano y en el invierno a la agricultura. Ana estudió hasta segundo grado no pudo continuar sus estudios debido a la pobreza en que vivían sus padres. Ana se dedica a la crianza de 200 pollos desde hace un año, antes ella se dedicaba a la agricultura y hortalizas.

El préstamo que esta solicitando en CREDICAMPO, es para la compra de concentrado para la crianza de 200 pollos los que venderá de 5 semanas y así continuar ese negocio porque le deja mas ingresos y así podrá darle a su grupo familiar una mejor alimentación.

Ana sueña con ahorrar para comprar un terrenito pequeño, para construir una vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Ana is 43 years old, married, and has four children ages 24, 22, 19 and 17.  Two of her children live with her and the other two are married.  Her husband works as a mason in the summer, and in the winter as a farmer.  Ana studied until second grade, but she was not able to continue her studies due to the poverty in which her parents lived.  Ana has worked raising 200 chickens for many years.  Before this, she worked farming and growing vegetables.

The loan that she is seeking from CREDICAMPO will be used to purchase animal feed to raise her 200 chickens that she will sell in five weeks.  This will allow her to continue her business because she will generate more income and will be able to provide her family with better nutrition.  Ana dreams of saving to purchase a small plot of land on which to build a proper home.

loans.use: purchase animal feed to raise 200 chickens.

loans.name: Nafhat Al- Iman Group

texts.en:
This group is called Nafhat Al-Iman. It consists of four ladies who live in Taiz, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 120,000 YER from AMB.

Kawther is a hardworking woman. She is a 33-year-old married woman with four children and all of them study in school. She lives with her family in a rented house in Taiz city. She is the leader of the group. Her husband is an employee in the private sector and he is the sole breadwinner of the family. In order to help her husband with the expenses of the family, Kawther decided to work in dressmaking. She started her business with a small capital. Her business lacks sewing materials and her capital is still low. For this reason, Kawther applied for a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase more sewing materials such as fabric, thread and buttons in order to improve her business.

Kawther looks forward to opening a saving account with AMB in order to provide her family with a secure future.

loans.use: to purchase more sewing materials such as fabric, thread and buttons in order to improve her business.

loans.name: Fedaa

texts.en:
Fedaa is a 39-year-old married woman from a small village near Ramallah. She is a mother of two sons and two daughters,  all under 18 years old. Three years ago, Fedaa and her husband opened a small butcher shop in the village. It is a very good business and the only one in their area.

Fedaa requested a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to improve the butcher shop and buy new tools and a refrigerator. By taking this loan, Fedaa will be able to increase sales and also income. Fedaa appears in the photo in her butcher shop

loans.use: to improve the butcher shop and buy new tools and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Yudis

texts.es: Yudis tiene 22 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 4 años de edad. Yudis es un hombre trabajador quien se gana la vida trabajando como jornalero y de esta forma mantienen la economía de su hogar. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha dado inicio a la construcción de su vivienda  la cual tiene a medias por la falta de recursos económicos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y lámina galvanizada. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder terminar su vivienda y dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Yudis is 22 years old and resides in his own home along with his four-year-old daughter. He is a hardworking man who earns his living as a day laborer. Working in this manner enables him to sustain the household finances.

With the desire to improve his living conditions, Yudis decided to begin the construction of his home. However, the work is only halfway done due to a lack of financial resources. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI so that he can invest in the purchase of wood and galvanized sheets. Yudis hopes to receive this loan so that he can finish his house and provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy wood and galvanized sheets so that he can finish building his home.

loans.name: Ana Margarita

texts.es: Ana tiene 47 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hijo de 9 años de edad.  Ana se gana la vida por medio de la prestación de servicios domésticos lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Con el deseo de terminar un cuarto al cual dio inicio hace unos meses y no ha podido terminar por falta de recursos económicos, solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder terminar el cuarto  dormitorio.
texts.en: Ana is 47 years old and lives with her husband and their nine year old son in a house that they own.  Ana earns a living working as a housekeeper, which allows her to provide for her household.  With the hope of finishing a room that she started building a few months ago but has not been able to finish due to a lack of financial resources, she is seeking a loan from FUSAI to purchase bricks, cement, sand and iron.  She hopes to be able to count on the funding so that she can finish building the bedroom.

loans.use: purchase bricks, cement, sand, and iron to finish building a room.

loans.name: Bibijon

texts.ru: Бибичон  предприниматель из города Душанбе. Она занимается торговым бизнесом. Ей 47 лет. В 2011 году Бибичон у своего брата получила помещение под магазин и начала свой бизнес по продажам продуктов питания. Бибичон продает такие продукты, как кексы, печенье, шоколад, конфеты, сухофрукты, колбасные и молочные продукты, рис, горох, гречку, а также хозяйственные товары. При покупке товара, Бибичон всегда обращает внимание на его качество. Она заботится о своих клиентах и о своей репутации. Поэтому у Бибичон постоянно много клиентов. Сейчас Бибичон необходимо привезти партию товаров, однако ее собственных средств не хватает. Поэтому Бибичон обратилась за кредитом в надежде на финансовую поддержку. Этот кредит ей действительно нужен.
texts.en: Bibijon is an entrepreneur from the city of Dushanbe. She is in the retail business. She is 47 years old. In 2011, Bibijon received a premises just outside of a shop from her brother and she started her own grocery selling business. Bibijon sell such groceries as cupcakes, cookies, chocolate, candy, dried fruit, sausage, dairy products, rice, peas, buckwheat, and other household food products. Before buying merchandise, Bibijon always pays attention to its quality. She is mindful of her customers and her reputation. This is why Bibijon constantly has a lot of customers. Now Bibijon needs to bring in a new shipment of merchandise, however her personal savings are not enough for this purchase. This is why Bibijon requested a loan in the hope of financial support. This loan is truly necessary for her.

loans.use: to buy high-quality groceries to expand her sales.

loans.name: Mbeyu

texts.en:
Mbeyu is a married woman living together with her husband and six children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past five years, she has operated a firewood selling business. She sells from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding her business to be a wholesale supplier of firewood in the village.

With the KES 50,000 she wants to purchase bundles of firewood for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of firewood for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Aido Manuel

texts.es: Un deseo de salir adelante junto con su esposa y tres hijos es el que motiva todos los días a salir a trabajar al señor Aido de 33 años de edad quien se desempeña como un vendedor de jugos y algunos comestibles pues por antes había laborado en empresas y pro el deseo de estar cerca a su familia opto por montar su propio negocio. Con el afán de mejorar su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia Aido solicita un crédito para reformar su negocio comprando activos fijos como silletería y ampliar su oferta de alimentos ya que planea levantar su negocio junto a su esposa quien el colaborara en este proyecto para bonificarse mutuamente y levantar juntos su futuro
texts.en: A dream of getting ahead with his wife and their three children is what motivates Aldo, 33 years old, to go out and work everyday.  He works selling juices and some foods.  Prior to this, he worked for companies, but his desire to be close to his family led him to start his own business.  With the hope of improving his business and improving his family's quality of life, Aldo is seeking a loan to upgrade his business.  He will purchase fixed assets like seating, and expanding his food offerings because he plants to enhance his business along with his wife with whom he is collaborating on this project to improve their lives and their future together.

loans.use: purchase seating to improve his business and expand his food offerings.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Dania

texts.es:
La señora Dania  de 45  años  de edad,  vive con sus dos hijos  en su casa de habitación, se dedica desde hace 20 años al negocio de venta de abarrotería en general como ser: arroz, frijoles, maíz, pastas de tomate, churros, jabón, frescos, verduras, lácteos, embutidos y pollo, además vende tacos, enchiladas, comida, carne asada, pollo, yuca, etc.  su venta es con los vecinos y amigos que a diario visitan su negocio. Doña Dania es una mujer trabajadora con deseos de salir adelante ella con su esfuerzo a podido estudiar a todas sus hijas.
Doña Dania está solicitando el préstamo para compra de más abarrotería ya que necesita invertir más en su negocio para lograr más ganancias y también comprar leña seca para cocinar sus golosinas.  Es su sexto  crédito que solita a prisma es una excelente clienta. 
Su sueño es construir unos cuartos para sus hijas.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Mayo del 2014.
texts.en:
Sra. Dania is 45 years old and resides with her two children in her own home. For the past 20 years, she has been selling groceries such as rice, beans, corn, tomato paste, snack foods, soap, soft drinks, vegetables, dairy products, sausages, and chicken. Dania also sells tacos, enchiladas, foodstuffs, roasted meat, chicken, cassava, and other dishes. Her sales are made to neighbors and friends who visit her business on a daily basis. Doña Dania is a hardworking woman who has the desire to succeed. Due to her efforts, her daughters have been able get an education.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy more groceries. Doña Dania needs to invest more into her business so that she can generate more earnings. She will also buy more dry firewood for cooking her dishes. This is the sixth loan that she is requesting from Prisma. Dania is an excellent client. Her dream is to build some rooms for her daughters.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - May 2014

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, corn, tomato paste, snack foods, soap, soft drinks, vegetables, dairy products, sausages, chicken, and firewood.

loans.name: Shamkhal

texts.en:
Shamkhal, 39 years old, is married. His elder child goes to school and, in the past year, his second child was born. The family has lived near the war zone as IDPs (Internally Displaced Persons) for over 20 years. 

Shamkhal has been in the animal breeding business for 5 years. Awhile ago, he applied to Komak for his second loan, in the amount of 1,000 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). He plans to use this loan to vaccinate his animals. Shamkhal says he is greatly thankful to the Kiva organization and lenders for all.

loans.use: to vaccinate his animals

loans.name: Oscar Miguel

texts.es: Oscar tiene 28 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida, sus hijos y sus suegra. Oscar trabaja como empleado en una empresas cercana a su localidad y de esta forma se gana la vida y logra llevar el sustento a su familia. Oscar ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSIA dado que desea construir un pozo artesanal en su vivienda con su respectiva caseta. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera, arena, cemento, ladrillo, etc.
texts.en:
Oscar, 28, lives in his own house with his wife, children and mother-in-law. He works as an employee in a local business, which gives him an income he can use to earn a living and support his family. 

Oscar has made the decision to ask for a loan from FUSAI because he wants to build a traditional well for his house with its own hut. With the requested amount, he will buy corrugated sheets, wood, sand, cement and bricks.

loans.use: to buy building materials to build a well for his home.

loans.name: Eyad

texts.en: Eyad is a 29-year-old, divorced man from Khanyounis. He lives alone in a very simple house. Four years ago, Eyad opened a store for selling gifts and cosmetics. It is a very good business and the demand is high. Eyad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more products for his store to resell. By taking this loan, Eyad will be able to increase the sales, especially in the Eid seasons.  Eyad appears in the photo in his store

loans.use: to buy more products for his store.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel tiene 31 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 7 años y 5 años de edad. Miguel se gana la vida trabajando como agricultor, él es un hombre muy dedicado a su familia y trabaja muy duro llevar el sustento diario a su familia. Actualmente Miguel y su familia no cuenta con el servicio de energía eléctrica por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la energía eléctrica en su vivienda y así poder dar a su familia mejores condiciones habitacionales.
texts.en:
Miguel, 31, lives in his own house with his wife and two children aged seven and five. He makes a living working in agriculture.  He is dedicated to his family and he works hard every day to provide for them. 

At the moment, he and his family do not have an electricity supply in their home, so he is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in installing one.  

This will provide him and his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to provide his home with electricity.

loans.name: Ronald Romeo

texts.es:
Ronald es un hombre  de 36 años de edad, vive en Chincha junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos que son su mayor motivación para salir adelante y por quienes ha trabajado tenazmente para poder brindarles un futuro mejor.
Desde hace más de 3 años presta servicios de reparaciones eléctricas, le va muy bien porque es una persona responsable, emprendedora y sobre todo porque todos sus trabajos los realiza con mucho cuidado y pensando en el bienestar de sus clientes.
Ronald está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con su apoyo él podrá realizar remodelaciones a su vivienda como pintar las paredes, refaccionar el piso, comprar clavos y calaminas  y arreglar también la puerta  para que su familia pueda sentir mayor seguridad y comodidad dentro del hogar. De esta manera él seguirá trabajando con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación y más adelante podrá cumplir su gran sueño: “Terminar de construir su vivienda”.
texts.en:
Ronald is a 36 year old man who lives in Chincha with his wife and two children who are his main motivation for getting ahead and for whom he works tenuously so he can provide them with a better future.

He has been providing electrical repair services for more than three years and things are going well for him because he is a responsible, enterprising man and above all because he does his jobs with great care and always thinks about the customers’ wellbeing.

Ronald is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because their support will help him remodel his home, such as painting the walls, repairing the floor, to buy nails and roofing, and to fix up the door so that the family can feel more secure and comfortable in the home.  He will continue to work with great effort and dedication so he can achieve his greatest dream of completing his house.

loans.use: to make home repairs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new tires for his motorcycle taxi and pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: 03 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Châu operates a food stall/restaurant selling rice and food for lunch and dinner. She is requesting a loan to purchase more food to cook and sell in her small restaurant. Châu is 54 years old and she is married with four children. Châu is the group leader of the 03 Đông Sơn Solidarity Group, which consists of three members.  She lives and works in Thanh Hoa City, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2009, Châu joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Châu has successfully repaid six loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Châu has been involved in this business for seven years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. With her business profits, Châu hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase more food to cook and sell in her small restaurant.

loans.name: Madina

texts.en:
Madina lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has 4 children, all going to school. Madina takes care of additional family members. For the past 10 years, she has operated a retail shop in a rented location. She works seven days a week. 

Madina has requested a loan of 2,700,000 UGX from MCDT – SACCO to buy sugar, rice, soap, cooking oil, flour and beans. Her major challenges include seasonality and transportation. Madina's goals and aspirations are to educate her children to university level and to buy a van for transporting her merchandise. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Madina's major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, sugar, rice and soap

loans.name: Abdi

texts.en:
Abdi is a married woman with two children, both of whom still attend school and are still under her care. They live in a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees for the children.

Abdi has operated a clothes selling business. She sells at the market to her town dwellers and her neighbours. She cites her major challenge to be seasonality. Abdi dreams of establishing a boutique in the future.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase two bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase two bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is a married woman with two children, both of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but not piped water.

She has operated a food vending business for the past three years, cooking chapati (flat bread), rice, and beans. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

With the loan of KES 50,000 that she is requesting, she wants to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour, and wheat flour for her food vending business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of sugar, rice, maize flour, and wheat flour

loans.name: Francisco Jose

texts.es:
El sueño más grande que tiene el señor francisco es poder tener grandes tierras que le permitan tener cultivos variados y que le brinden la oportunidad de tener unos ingresos más estables y duraderos.
Él es muy trabajador y laborioso, tiene una experiencia de 30 años en actividades agrícolas que lo respaldan. Vive en el municipio de Tierra Alta, Córdoba y es una persona bastante reconocido en el sector por su carisma y buen humor.
Tiene el proyecto de seguir creciendo como empresario y comenzar ofrecer empleos, por eso necesita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de materiales que le permitan trabajar su tierra como riegos y abonos, esto le dará unos cultivos mucho más sanos y de mejor calidad.
Su mayor desafío es la falta de oportunidades pero manifiesta gran expectativa con este préstamo.
texts.en:
Mr. Francisco’s main dream is to have a large property that will permit him to have a variety of crops, which will bring him the opportunity to have more stable and lasting earnings.

He is very hardworking and laborious; he counts with 30 years of experience in agricultural activities. He lives in the municipality of Tierra Alta, Cordoba, and he is well known in the area for his charisma and good humour.

He has the project of continuing to grow as an entrepreneur and to start offering employment, which is why he needs a loan to invest it in paying for materials like irrigation and fertilizers which will allow him to work the land. This will give him crops that are healthier and of a better quality. 

His biggest challenge is the lack of opportunity but he holds great expectations for this loan.

loans.use: buy agricultural consumables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs for fattening.

loans.name: Dagoberto

texts.es:
Dagoberto es un hombre dedicado al trabajo de latonería y pintura la cual aprendió gracias a su tío quien lo guio y le enseño toda la profesión. Gracias a su independización logro adquirir un buen reconocimiento y una mejor estabilidad económica que es lo que buscan las personas comúnmente al independizare e iniciar su carrera como emprendedor, es padre de tres hijos los cuales no superan la mayoría de edad y su único deseo es poder brindarles una educación profesional y gracias a su negocio va por buen camino. 
Para un empresa lo más importante es estar actualizándose y estar en constante cambio para beneficiar sus clientes y esto es algo que Dagoberto lo tiene muy claro y es que atravesó de observaciones e indagaciones noto que en el sector son muy pocas las empresas que tiene un soldador de punto frio el cual e usa para trabajos muy puntales y es por esta razón que pide una ayuda crediticia para adquirir esta maquinaria y poder ofrecer a sus clientes un portafolio de servicio más amplio con el que esperar seguir recogiendo ingresos para la educación de sus  hijos
texts.en:
Dagoberto is a man who works in car body repair and painting.  He learnt this trade under the guidance of his uncle.  Thanks to him becoming independent he has managed to make a name for himself which has brought about more economic stability, which is what people who become independent workers are looking for when they start their own businesses.  

He is the father of three children who are still young.  His only wish is to be able to provide them with a proper education.  Thanks to his business, he is managing to fulfil that ambition. 

For a company, the most important thing is to keep ahead of the game and constantly look for ways to change in order to benefit the customers.  After doing research and observing work in the sector, Dagoberto is clear on what he needs to do. He has noticed that not many of his competitors have the ability to carry out cold welding which he can use on certain jobs. For this reason, he is asking for a loan to buy this machinery so he can offer his customers a wider range of services.  

He hopes that this will allow him to continue generating an income to provide for his children's education.

loans.use: t buy equipment for cold welding, so he can offer his customers more services.

loans.name: Nairo De Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Nairo es un agricultor muy habilidoso con experiencia en varias áreas de la agricultura, con un talento innato para el trabajo en equipo y una gran mente emprendedora.
Tiene un gran cultivo de yuca que atiende todos los días desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana.
Actualmente vive con su esposa y su hija de 2 años por las cuales ha tratado de luchar siempre para sacarlas adelante.
El desea darle un impulso a su cultivo y obtener mejores ingresos de este por eso pide un auxilio económico para invertirlo en insumos agropecuarios y semillas de yuca, el préstamo le dará la oportunidad de tener un producto de mejor calidad.
Su mayor sueño es tener una casa propia y brindarle a su hija un buen futuro.
texts.en:
Nairo is a very skilful farmer with experience in many areas of agriculture.  He has a natural talent for working in a team and he has a great entrepreneurial mind.

Has a great cultivation of cassava which he looks after every day from the early hours of the morning.

At the moment, he lives with his wife and their two-year-old daughter who he has always strived to provide for.

He wishes to boost his crops and improve his income.  For this reason he is asking for financial aid to invest in agricultural supplies and cassava seeds.  The loan will give him the opportunity to produce a better quality product.

His ultimate aim is to have his own house and make sure that his daughter has a good future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and cassava seeds.

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine is from Aygezard village of the Ararat region. She lives there with her husband and 26-year-old son. Her son is a policeman working at local station. Narine and her husband are farmers. They are involved in aviculture and land cultivation. They grow a big variety of fruit trees and sell the gathered harvest in the markets. 

Narine has requested this loan of USD 3,000 to be able to invest in her farming business. The loan is very important for her to be able to pay for watering costs, wires for the orchard, and watermelon seeds. As this is her first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products in the past because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for watering costs, wires for the orchard, and watermelon seeds

loans.name: Turpa

texts.en:
Turpa is a 46-year-old woman. She lives with her son Zakaria, who works as a security guard and gets a small monthly income. Turpa has a small plot of agricultural land, where she grows peaches. She sells the harvest locally. 

She wants to start a husbandry business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 2,000 GEL to purchase calves. She will raise them and will expand the livestock in future. Turpa awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase calves
